Name: Trapers Platformer
About the game: A fun and challenging adventure awaits Our hero, Tortuga, wakes up falling from a cliff! Not the best way to start the day, but things are about to get much, much worse! The peaceful island of Monta√±a Clara and the inhabitants of Lost Town are in danger, and somehow you are the only one able to do something about it. A stylish, unique in a weird but charming way game! In this platforming game with hand drawn graphics, you will explore a varied set of environments, jump over stuff, push stuff, fight foes and try to avoid getting pierced by spiky stuff! Collect optional weapons, upgrades and unique key items. Make friends and meet new allies along the way. Fight many bosses with unique mechanics. A story driven main quest that doesn't overstay it's welcome. Featuring optional quests and hidden maps with secret items waiting for you! Explore different paths in non-linear levels. Make friends and find treasure! Talk to NPCs! Discover the mysteries behind this story driven quest. The challenge is set. The bad guys are waiting. The cute bunnies depend on you to save them from a deadly fate. Come on! There's even a talking crocodile trying to help!
